product_name: bareMineralsBAREPRO 24HR Skin Perfecting Talc-Free Matte Powder Foundation
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganThe bareMinerals BAREPRO 24HR Skin Perfecting Talc-Free Matte Powder Foundation is a talc-free, natural matte foundation that now provides 24 hours of breathable full coverage and all-day oil control, while visibly reducing pores.
details: DetailsBenefits24hr weightless wear*, all-day oil & shine control **Crease-proof, transfer-proof**Sweat, humidity,and water-proof**Does not clog pores. Non-acnegenic. Non-comedogenic. Dermatologist-tested. **Ideal for all skin types***Based on an independent consumer study**Based on an independent clinical studyResearch ResultsSkin-improving formula reduces pores by 12% after 4 weeks**Visibly smoother skin texture in 4 weeks**Reduction in dark spots/ hyperpigmentation in 4 weeks****Based on an independent clinical studyKey IngredientsBrightening Pineapple Complex with Licorice Root: Brighten and refresh skin's texture by stimulating cell turnoverCocoa Butter + Shea Butter: Helps to preserves skin's moisture balancePeony Flower & Sugarcane-derived Squalane: Promotes the appearance of smoother skin by reducing roughnessItem 2632980How To UseUse wet or dry.For a dry application:Apply this formula dry with the included sponge or the Luxe Performance Foundation Brush (sold separately). This application is ideal for balanced, combination or oily skin, or for on-the-go use.Press the sponge or brush onto the powder.Sweep the product across your face, starting where you want the most coverage and blending outward in long strokes.For a wet application:If you have dry skin or want the fullest coverage, use a damp sponge or brush to get the creamiest application. Tip when using wet: Allow 30 seconds for the powder to dry down to its natural matte finish & shade before setting or applying additional makeup as the shade may appear richer & more vibrant when applied wet.How to Wet the Sponge or Brush:SPONGE (included):Dampen the sponge under cool water until it expands.Squeeze out any excess water in a towel so the sponge is damp, not soaked.BRUSH:Dip the brush head into cool water (avoid soaking the barrel of the brush).Squeeze out any excess water in a towel so the brush is damp, not soaked.IngredientsSynthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, Zinc Stearate, Silica, Calcium Carbonate, Diphenyl Dimethicone/Vinyl Diphenyl Dimethicone/Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Magnesium Myristate, Dimethicone, Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Squalane, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Juice, Paeonia Albiflora Root Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sorbic Acid, Methicone, Aluminum Hydroxide, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Tocopherol, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Citric Acid. +/- (May Contain/Peut Contenir) Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

This application is ideal for balanced, combination or oily skin, or for on-the-go use.Press the sponge or brush onto the powder.Sweep the product across your face, starting where you want the most coverage and blending outward in long strokes.For a wet application:If you have dry skin or want the fullest coverage, use a damp sponge or brush to get the creamiest application. Tip when using wet: Allow 30 seconds for the powder to dry down to its natural matte finish & shade before setting or applying additional makeup as the shade may appear richer & more vibrant when applied wet.How to Wet the Sponge or Brush:SPONGE (included):Dampen the sponge under cool water until it expands.Squeeze out any excess water in a towel so the sponge is damp, not soaked.BRUSH:Dip the brush head into cool water (avoid soaking the barrel of the brush).Squeeze out any excess water in a towel so the brush is damp, not soaked.

reviews.headline: Yes to BareMinerals talc-free matte powder foundation
reviews.comments: After using cover girl in the beginning followed by M.A.C. cosmetics for over a decade- my skin became sensitive and allergies got the best of me. So i looked to talc free products. While M.A.C. Has recently come out with their own version of matte talc free- it is still heavier and more oily. For the past five years i have claimed BM as my go to for the flawless coverage. With a foundation brush works wonders follow up with sponge detailing. Note - everyone has different skin types even sensitive skin so do a test area on your face before you apply to make sure the makeup is a fit.

reviews.headline: It's a great reliable product but runs out every 2 months!
reviews.comments: I love this product but I find myself refilling it every 2 months, which makes it less competitive, cost-wise, among other foundations. As long as you moisturize well beforehand, this product applies very smoothly and last all day. I like to sponge that it comes with for undereye darkness and spot treatment for blemishes.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: It blend with my skin

reviews.headline: Always use Barepro
reviews.comments: I have used Barepro for years!  It's my everyday face powder.

reviews.headline: great coverage!
reviews.comments: Matches and feels great. Not spotty or caked on.

reviews.headline: I will never be without it
reviews.comments: I cannot tell you how many of these I have gone through and hit pan until pan was empty! It is beautiful. The cover is beautiful. It makes your skin look flawless. I will never be without this as a part of my daily routine!

reviews.headline: Great for oil skin or if you want just a light coverage
reviews.comments:
I really love this foundation, and the fact that it's talc-free is a huge win for me. I'm allergic to talc my skin breaks out in hives, turns red, and if it gets near my eyes, I can't see so finding a foundation without it is absolutely worth it. Yes, it's on the pricey side, but I'll gladly pay more to avoid constant redness and hives.

I picked up Fair 10 Cool, and the color match is spot-on. The product wears beautifully and lasts a long time. I recommend applying it with a brush or a fresh powder puff the one included doesn't work well.
My only complaint is the packaging. The product is stored on top, but it often opens at the section where the extra puff is, and I end up having to use tweezers to pull down the flap to access it. The design definitely needs a fix.

reviews.headline: I HATE this new formula
reviews.comments: I'm constantly having to change products because Bare Minerals is constantly changinng their formulas. The original 16hr full coverage pressed powder was AMAZING. This new 24hr talc-free matte SUCKS. It is NOT full coverage, so you have to layer it on, which makes it feel heavy and cakey and dry. Also, the shades are different. I was wearing Fair 10 Warm in the original formula, now it looks too dark and yellow in the new formula.

reviews.headline: Skin like finish with blurring power.
reviews.comments:
I have combination skin and this powder is exactly what I've been searching for. It delivers soft, natural coverage that still looks and feels like my own skin but blurs away the imperfections I want to hide. My perfect match is actually between Fair 10 Neutral and Fair 15 Neutral â€” I switch depending on the time of year and how much sun I've gotten (even though I'm still pale year-round!).

The texture is silky and weightless, and it blends so smoothly without ever looking cakey. It holds up beautifully through a full day â€” no patchiness, no settling into fine lines, and no oxidation. My biggest tip: always buff it in with a fluffy brush, working in light circular motions, for a seamless, airbrushed look. This is a must-have if you want that "your skin but better" effect with comfortable wear all day.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again!
reviews.comments: Covers skin so well!

reviews.headline: Great for Summer
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this powder foundation by bareMinerals. It performed exceptionally well during this year's summer heat. For full transparency, I did need to blot once, but that was only after six hours of wear. Apart from that, this powder foundation has become a staple in my makeup collection. If you have oily to combination skin, I highly recommend giving it a try. .

reviews.headline: This is the real deal
reviews.comments: I wear this daily. On my training days this stays put and I've really put it to the test. I've worn it sweaty and in humidityâ€”it doesn't budge. The coverage is buildable too. It's my staple makeup.

reviews.headline: Coverage is very good
reviews.comments: I love the coverage and  color

reviews.headline: BRING BACK THE 16 HR FORMULA
reviews.comments: With the 16 hour formula, my skin was flawless. This was one of the only brands that I can get a perfect shade match for. I got soooo many compliments all the time on my makeup. This new formula is not an exact match and it feels more dry. Terrible!

reviews.headline: My go to daily foundation
reviews.comments: Love the coverage without the heavy feel or cakey look. I use this everyday its so light. Traditional foundations just feel too sticky and always show larger pores, this product does not.

reviews.headline: My favorite powder foundation
reviews.comments: It does not make my skin break out. It's very smooth to apply.

reviews.headline: Horrible
reviews.comments: I hate this new formula. I bought two so I have an unopened one I can return, I hope. This is horrible. Makes me look like I have holes in my skin. I thought I was my primer, nope!!! I wish they would stop discontinuing products that work. I can't get the stick concealer and now my foundation.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again!
reviews.comments: Good product!

reviews.headline: Perfect  shade match
reviews.comments: Love the product! But the customer experience  was top tier. The sales rep was super helpful, funny, great day. Was bought in Hanford, CA. store.

reviews.headline: Formula Change
reviews.comments: This has been my go-to everyday makeup for a long time. My last purchase, I noticed that they no longer have the Light 20 Cool. This was my perfect shade match! I ended up ordering the Light 22 Cool and the color is way off and the formula seems different and almost cakey. Do not think I will purchase again.

faceoff_positive.comments:
Finding the perfect foundation can be a game-changer, and the BAREPROÂ® 24HR Skin Foundation in Medium 30 Cool delivers in ways that make it a must-have for anyone seeking long-lasting, flawless coverage. Here's my take:

Coverage and Finish

The coverage is full yet incredibly lightweight. It effectively conceals blemishes, redness, and uneven skin tone without feeling heavy or cakey. The satin-matte finish strikes the perfect balance, giving your skin a natural yet polished look. Medium 30 Cool is a perfect match for my neutral-cool undertones, blending seamlessly with no awkward lines or patches.

Longevity

This foundation truly lives up to its 24-hour claim. I wore it for an entire dayâ€”from a morning workout to an evening dinnerâ€”and it didn't budge. It's sweat-resistant, humidity-proof, and stays intact even after hours of wear, making it ideal for busy days or special events.

Skin Benefits

What sets this product apart is its skincare-infused formula. It contains bamboo extract and papaya enzymes, which help improve skin texture over time. I've noticed my skin feels smoother and less prone to breakouts after regular use. Plus, it's non-comedogenic, so it won't clog pores.

Application

The liquid formula glides on effortlessly, whether you're using a brush, sponge, or your fingers. It dries quickly but allows enough playtime to blend perfectly. I recommend starting with a small amount and building up coverage as needed.

Final Thoughts

The BAREPROÂ® 24HR Skin Foundation in Medium 30 Cool is a holy grail for anyone looking for a reliable, high-performance foundation. It's a bit of an investment, but the results are worth every penny. Whether you have a long day at work, an evening out, or just want to feel confident in your own skin, this foundation won't let you down.

Would I repurchase? Absolutely. This product has earned a permanent spot in my makeup routine.
faceoff_positive.headline: Perfect Powder Foundation

faceoff_negative.comments:
I received this product as part of a campaign and I am happy to provide my feedback. I will divide my review into pros and cons based on my experience. For reference, I have combination oily skin and moderate redness in my cheeks. I tend to use medium to full coverage foundation that is considered a matte or natural matte finish.

Pros: The packaging is sleek, attractive and convenient for travel. The color and undertone range is inclusive. I did not experience the product oxidizing on my face after wearing it for a few hours. I did not notice any perfume or fragrance with the product. The product did give extra coverage when used in conjunction with a liquid foundation. The shade looked nice on my skin (easy to select a decent match) and did provide a moderate amount of oil control. The product played nicely with the liquid foundation and didn't streak or cake and helped cover the redness in my cheeks.

Cons: I did not like the sponge applicator that is included with the foundation. I was not able to achieve a desirable finish using the sponge. I ended up using a powder puff instead. I was not able to get enough coverage with the foundation alone. I ended up using a light application of liquid foundation and then finished with the Bare Minerals powder foundation. Unfortunately I did experience some breakouts when using this product, but to be fair I experience breakouts with any foundation that has "skincare" ingredients. My skin just doesn't like foundations that have skincare included. I think that the price is a little steep if you are unable to use this as a stand-alone foundation. Overall, I would recommend this product if you don't have issues with foundations that include skincare ingredients and prefer a lighter coverage foundation.
faceoff_negative.headline: Missed the mark for me
